name: LetterM
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: letter m.
des:
From the team that helped a three year old go from phonics to reading at a second grade level comes "Letter M. " 

Letter M. assesses and reviews the concept of phonics. The letter M. lesson allows early English readers to practice identifying words that start with "M." to improve phonic fluency.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
